item.title: ARDX
item.description: score:71 Chances: The company has achieved significant commercial progress, with one of its medication expected to generate over $1 billion in annual sales revenue at peak. Investors tend to be attracted to stocks that trade at a cheap price, offering the possibility of great returns for not a large amount of capital invested.
